notesStmt.note: There are lacunae after folios 2, 34, 44, 103 and 117. Defective at the end. Several folios have been water-damaged and stained.
Yeshu῾ah Rofe᾿ ben Mordekhai Rofe᾿: inscribed, folio 1r.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A fragment of Judeo-Arabic commentary of Japheth ben Ali on Exodus 18-20.

msItem.title: Perush Shemot פרוש שמות The commentary on Exodus

collation.p: 13 quires (1-11 and 13-14) of mostly 10 leaves each. Quires signed with Hebrew letters and Arabic numerals on the upper margin of the first page, and with Hebrew letters on the lower margin of the last page.

binding.p: BM/BL in-house. Spine: 'Yefet Com. on Exodus. Arabic. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2466.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Library from him on 08 July 1882, folio [121v].
